articles.title: The health of U.S. kids has declined significantly since 2007, a new study finds - NPR
articles.description: A new study in the journal JAMA finds the health of America's children has worsened across several key indicators over the last two decades. That includes the number of children with chronic diseases.
articles.content: When Dr. Christopher Forrest began his career in pediatrics some 25 years ago, he says it was pretty uncommon to see children come in with chronic conditions. But that's changed. Nowadays, he says an… [+3361 chars]

articles.title: 200 million year-old jawbone revealed as new species - BBC
articles.description: The newly discovered flying reptile is the oldest pterosaur in North America.
articles.content:
Victoria GillScience correspondent, BBC News
The new pterosaur has been named Eotephradactylus mcintireae, meaning 'ash-winged dawn goddess'
